app.suggest_level.title: Monkey has chosen for you
app.suggest_level.level1.desc: Stage 1 is for children who are new to English or know some basic vocabulary.
app.suggest_level.level2.desc: Stage 2 is for children who can read simple short sentences.
app.suggest_level.level3.desc: Stage 3 is for children who can read moderately long sentences.
app.terms.ios: Please see Terms of Use and Privacy Policy for more information. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal at the cost of the selected subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions by going to your iTunes account settings and turning off auto-renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when your purchase is confirmed. Once your purchase is confirmed, the remainder of your free trial will be forfeited.
app.terms.android: Please see Terms of Use and Privacy Policy for more information. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Account will be charged for renewal at the cost of the selected subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renew by going to your Google Play account settings. Your Google Play account will be charged when your purchase is confirmed. Once your purchase is confirmed, the remainder of the free trial will be forfeited.
